title: Independent States of America
description: Long after the financial collapse, the last thing the rebuilding former United States nations wanted, or needed, was a major war. Yet, events kept dragging the ISA, the Independent States of America toward an all-out conflict with their ideological rival, Homeland.Independent States of America is the third novel in the Kings and Clans Trilogy Â©, and includes many of the same characters found in the previous two novels.
author: Den Warren
